name: Blindfolded
description:
"Blindfolded is definitely unique on the App Store, and is a real challenge."

- AppAdvice


"Blindfolded Is a Game That Would Challenge Even Daredevil"

- Gamezebo


"The concept is simple, but actually navigating through the path requires a good eye and confident movements"

- Indie Game Magazine


They say when you lose one of your senses, the others get enhanced…

This is what Blindfolded is all about. It´s a game about trusting your instincts. Letting your mind lead you through 60 levels - completely Blindfolded.
